medicine_manufacturers.solutions: PhRMA is working to drive patient-centered progress in innovation, affordability, and access to life-saving prescription medicines. They are committed to developing new treatments to improve patients' health and save lives, reducing healthcare costs, improving access to medicines, and addressing misaligned incentives in the healthcare system.

Access To Medicine Foundation.solutions: Publishing report cards and company profiles that assess the actions companies are taking to address key access-to-medicine priorities, setting out opportunities for improvement. Companies analyzed by the Index and the AMR Benchmark are also scored and ranked on their performance.

key_features.Access to Medicine Index: Assesses 20 of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies in relation to their efforts to expand access to medicine for people living in 108 low- and middle-income countries
key_features.AMR Benchmark: Assesses how pharma companies tackle drug resistance & ensure appropriate access
key_features.Generic & Biosimilar Medicines Programme: Assesses major generic and biosimilar medicine manufacturers' efforts to expand access to their essential products in low- and middle-income countries

criteria.drug_discovery: Universities and research institutions traditionally carry out early-stage drug discovery. Modern biotechnology focuses on understanding metabolic pathways related to disease states or pathogens and manipulating these pathways using molecular biology or biochemistry.
criteria.drug_development: Activities undertaken after a compound is identified as a potential drug to establish its suitability as a medication. Research in these areas generally includes a combination of in vitro studies, in vivo studies, and clinical trials. Large multinational corporations exhibit vertical integration, participating in a broad range of drug discovery and development, manufacturing and quality control, marketing, sales, and distribution.

research_and_development.usecases: To discover or design potential drugs and establish their suitability as medications.
research_and_development.solutions: Drug discovery and drug development services.
research_and_development.key_features: Early-stage drug discovery, drug development, clinical trials, and vertical integration.

criteria.approval_process: New pharmaceutical products must be approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) in the United States as being both safe and effective. This process generally involves submission of an Investigational New Drug filing with sufficient pre-clinical data to support proceeding with human trials. Following successful completion of phase III testing, a New Drug Application is submitted to the FDA for approval to market the product in the US.
criteria.post_approval_surveillance: A fourth phase of post-approval surveillance is often required due to the fact that even the largest clinical trials cannot effectively predict the prevalence of rare side-effects. Postmarketing surveillance ensures that after marketing the safety of a drug is monitored closely.

product_approval.usecases: To gain approval for new pharmaceutical products and ensure post-approval surveillance for drug safety.
product_approval.solutions: Product approval and post-approval surveillance services.
product_approval.key_features: FDA approval process, post-approval surveillance, and Orange Book site for approved drugs.

criteria.research_and_investment: The pharmaceuticals and biotechnology industry spends more than 15% of its net sales for Research & Development, which is by far the highest share compared to other industries. Industry-wide research and investment reached a record $65.3 billion in 2009.
criteria.cost_estimates: The cost of developing a successful new drug has been estimated at US$1.3 billion (not including marketing expenses). Some estimates also take into account the opportunity cost of investing capital many years before revenues are realized.
criteria.regulatory_requirements: In many non-US western countries, a 'fourth hurdle' of cost effectiveness analysis has developed before new technologies can be provided. Treatments must represent 'value for money' and a net benefit to society.

cost_of_innovation.usecases: To understand the cost of innovation in drug discovery and development, research and investment, and regulatory requirements.
cost_of_innovation.solutions: Cost of innovation analysis and regulatory compliance services.
cost_of_innovation.key_features: High R&D investment, cost estimates, and regulatory compliance.

key_features: Focus on quality and safety standards

company_1.name: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America (PhRMA)

criteria.R&D Intensity: PhRMA member firms' R&D intensity averaged about 19% over the past two decades, exceeding 25% in 2018 and 2019
criteria.R&D Spending Trends: R&D spending in the pharmaceutical industry has trended upward, with a nearly 50% increase between 2015 and 2019

R&D Spending.usecases: PhRMA member firms' R&D spending covers a variety of activities including invention, development, incremental innovation, product differentiation, and safety monitoring
R&D Spending.solutions: PhRMA member firms focus on developing and testing new drugs, conducting clinical trials, developing incremental innovations, and conducting post-approval testing for safety monitoring or marketing purposes

criteria.Average Annual Approvals: FDA approved about 38 new drugs per year from 2010 through 2019, with a peak of 59 in 2018
criteria.Types of New Drugs in Development: Emphasizing treatments for cancer and nervous system disorders like Alzheimer’s disease and Parkinson’s disease

New Drug Development.usecases: Developing and introducing new drugs, focusing on treatments for cancer and nervous system disorders
New Drug Development.solutions: Introducing growing numbers of new drugs annually, with an emphasis on treatments for cancer and nervous system disorders
New Drug Development.key_features: Average annual approvals, types of new drugs in development

PharmaNewsIntelligence.solutions: Provides information and resources related to pharmaceutical industry
PharmaNewsIntelligence.key_features: Wide range of topics covered, access to industry reports and resources
